CustomField.description: Document generation naming convention, by defining a string of delimited variables, in the format %VariableName1%_%VariableName 2%. The default value is %:Proposal_Name__c%_%action%_%templatename%_%timestamp%.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Document generation naming convention, by defining a string of delimited variables, in the format %VariableName1%_%VariableName 2%. The default value is %:Proposal_Name__c%_%action%_%templatename%_%timestamp%.
CustomField.label: Document Naming Convention
